sentence.Network_en: Anastigmatic lens : Photographic lens corrected for astigmatism as well as other distortions.
sentence.Network_cn: 消像差透镜: 消除纵横像差和其他畸变的摄影用透镜.

sentence.Network_en: Anastigmatic lens : Photographic lens corrected astigmatism as well as other distortions. Process camera lenses are anastigmats.
sentence.Network_cn: 消像差透镜: 消除纵横像差和其他畸变的摄影用透镜. 制版照相机所用的镜头是消像差透镜.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from an- 'not' + astigmatic (see astigmatism)

means.word_mean: 1. pertaining to a lens or lens system free of astigmatism (able to form point images)
